org.sitemesh.config

Class MetaTagBasedDecoratorSelector<C extends SiteMeshContext>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sitemesh.config.PathBasedDecoratorSelector<C>
      • org.sitemesh.config.MetaTagBasedDecoratorSelector<C>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DecoratorSelector<C>

    public class MetaTagBasedDecoratorSelector<C extends SiteMeshContext>
extends PathBasedDecoratorSelector<C>
    DecoratorSelector implementation that selects a decorator based on the meta tag in the page header

    Example

     <meta name="decorator" content="/my-decorator,/my-other-decorator">
    See Also:
    PathMapper
